### Welcome

Welcome to the webpages for this online ISCB course in biostatistics on causal inference for time-to-event outcome with practical applications in R.

To register for the course, follow the instruction at ... 

Note that there is a limit to the number of participants to the course and that registration will be closed when this limit is reached.

All teaching resources will be put out on this webpage in due time before the beginning of the course. Information about how to access these files will sent out to registrered participants together with Zoom links for the lectures and R practicals.

More details about the course can be found [here](about.html).
